apt update: Update the package list. /< sudo apt update >/
apt upgrade -y: Upgrade all packages. /< sudo apt upgrade -y >/
apt clean: Remove .deb files for packages that are no longer installed. /< sudo apt clean >/
apt autoclean: Remove .deb files for packages that are no longer installed. /< sudo apt autoclean >/
apt autoremove -y: Remove packages that are no longer needed. /< sudo apt autoremove -y >/
journalctl --vacuum-time=3d: Remove journal entries older than 3 days. /< sudo journalctl --vacuum-time=3d >/
journalctl --vacuum-size=100M: Remove journal entries to free up disk space. /< sudo journalctl --vacuum-size=100M >/
systemd-tmpfiles --clean: Clean up temporary files. /< sudo systemd-tmpfiles --clean >/
